data.title: Enghouse – Tazcom
data.text:
Enghouse Systems acquired Dialogic Inc. in 2020, expanding its business portfolio. Dialogic has been the industry leader, developing infrastructure products in partnership with technology developers and 48 of the world’s topmost mobile operators. This acquisition has established them as one of the top names in the world of Unified Communications (UC). Businesses can leverage enterprise software solutions to streamline operations and improve productivity.

Tazcom & Dialogic/Enghouse

In today’s quickly progressing digital age, software and applications are vital for the success of any business. Tazcom is an agile, authorized distributor of products that ensure fast turnarounds. Enjoy digital transformation to stay ahead of the competition.

Why Dialogic/Enghouse?

Enghouse Networks is touted as one of the leading telecommunications providers worldwide. With increased globalization, businesses shouldn’t be bound to any geographical location. Enghouse has a range of products that enable complete digital transformation to help employees and clients stay connected.

Dialogic is well-known for its cloud-based solutions for all types of businesses. Dialogic’s vast portfolio boasts communication products that achieve effective connectivity across the most complex networks. Together, this acquisition is geared to help enterprises cut development and maintenance costs and also achieve integration to match the company’s needs.

Create revolutionary software applications for your business

Industry leading video and voice solutions and ease integration of the two

Enjoy seamless connectivity across UC platforms

Get access to the best, owing to the merger of two significant names in the digital transformation and Unified Communications landscape

The Importance of Digital Transformation

There is a need for real-time and remote communications to meet the ever-changing business landscape. Customer demands are gradually increasing, and companies must adapt to stay ahead of the game. There is only one way to do that: through effective digital transformation. Whether you want to deliver an enhanced client experience or ensure effective communication among all employees in an organization, you need high-tech products.

Dialogic/Enghouse offers cloud-based communications solutions that can easily integrate with other applications like your customer relations platform to deliver better client service. Businesses can also leverage Unified Communications as a service (UCaaS) solutions to make communication easier and seamless, no matter where your employees may be. This successfully side steps any roadblocks with remote work, a common trend today.
